news_header: Four women urge US not to interfere in Andrew Tate's Romanian legal case amid serious allegations.
news_original_title: US must not interfere in Tate's case, say alleged victims
news_text: Four women alleging sexual abuse by Andrew Tate have expressed concern over US interference in his Romanian case. They seek justice without external pressure, emphasizing the seriousness of the allegations against Tate and his brother, who face multiple charges.
